alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 23 at 1:29PM MST until January 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Be especially cautious on bridges and overpasses which are prone to becoming icy when winter weather occurs.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432- 4269.
